meta.name: Subculture Vaporwave
meta.description: 蒸汽波风格，紫粉渐变，适合复古未来、流行文化

base.container: background: linear-gradient(180deg, #1a0b2e 0%, #2d1b4e 100%); color: #ff9ecd; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.7; padding: 20px;

header_window.style: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff00ff, #00ffff); border: 4px solid #ffffff; border-radius: 0; padding: 8px 16px; margin-bottom: 20px;
header_window.title_style: color: #1a0b2e; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 4px; text-transform: uppercase;

headings.h2: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff00ff, #00ffff); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 900; margin: 24px 0 14px; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 4px; text-shadow: 0 0 20px #ff00ff80;
headings.h3: color: #00ffff; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; margin: 18px 0 10px; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; text-shadow: 0 0 10px #00ffff60;
headings.h1: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff00ff, #00ffff); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 900; margin: 24px 0 14px; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 4px; text-shadow: 0 0 20px #ff00ff80;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #ff00ff30; color: #00ffff; padding: 2px 6px; border: 1px solid #ff00ff; font-size: 90%;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #0d0d1a; color: #00ffff; padding: 16px; border-radius: 0; margin: 16px 0; font-size: 12px; border: 2px solid #ff00ff; box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #00ffff;
blocks.quote_tip: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff00ff20, #00ffff20); border: 2px solid #ff00ff; color: #ff9ecd; padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0;
blocks.quote_warning: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #00ffff20, #ff00ff20); border: 2px solid #00ffff; color: #00ffff; padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0;
blocks.hr: border: 0; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #ff00ff, #00ffff, transparent); margin: 28px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff00ff20, #00ffff20); border: 4px dashed #ff00ff; color: #ff9ecd; padding: 24px; text-align: center; margin: 18px 0;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 35px; padding: 16px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff00ff, #00ffff); text-align: center;
footer.text: color: #1a0b2e; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 3px; text-transform: uppercase;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
